name: Its just a story
description:
/...Development build out...\

you play as a character created from a story,  the main goal of the story was to scare off some annoying school kids but then it goes even deeper, i think its a bit too much for the kids...

you find yourself in a strange house...The Beginning of the puzzle, "what really happened here?" you have to find out, don't worry its NOT SCARY.

------rolling back to how you ended up in that world-------

it was 5.00am and the sunrise for the day was kicking in, Mrs vet, finally woke up from her annoying alarm in the morning, she gets up and heads to the toilet, she lives in the city of newyork an average apartment for a mid-age lady(in her 20s) 27 to be precise, with an apartment of 1 room, a living room, kitchen and toilet, with a classic interior city design, she comes out of the toilet and went towards her living room to press the remote of the wide screen window of the beautiful city view from her side open, she plays a music as she grunts from her body still aching her from last night party, she moves to the kitchen to get her favorite morning tea which was a spearmint green tea good for heavy heads like her to sober up… yh pretty lazy of her u might say, but vet wasn’t like this back in the days she was a nerd, good and innocent but things changed for her when her parents died and she realized she has to adapt or tolerate things in other to get things moving her own way, so she thought… Mrs vet was done getting ready for her most annoying jobs as she works 3 different jobs one of them happen to be a teacher the other two lets say they more fun than this hahaha, vet got into the taxi and headed for school, the moment she got to school, Mr Alfred has been waiting for her, whos Mr Alfred? My favorite part I can say, again and again, Mr. Alfred is a fat annoying dude, trust me I hate to be a hater, fat people are cute, hot, and even smart also get the chicks but this dude nope even if he was muscular or the rock, with his brain and personality he would still remain the most annoying guy in the world. What's the reason for him waiting for Mrs vet? well, it's not obvious but for me, it is, Mr. Alfred here has been turned down by Mrs.vet 82 times now and counting am sure this would be making it 83rd time now, Mrs vet sighs and approaches him,-me

Mrs vet-“ok let's get to the point Mr. Alfred, am not going to give m…”

MR.Alfred-(smirking with his missing teeth from his last punch from Mrs vet when he tried to group her) “save it  vet and come with me to the principal office, your day has finally come”

ok I wasn’t expecting that maybe this might not be the 83rd time maybe the next day might,…Mrs vet walks a few meters behind Mr. Alfred as they walked to the principal office, his dress today was quite outstanding than previous days, like the day he was putting on a see-through shirt(god that was onion to the eyes of many), 

Mrs vet-“hmm you looking good today, what's the catch” her way of complimenting him

Mr.Alfred-“nothing just I got what I wanted and a date tonight”

ok, hold on there, getting what he wants, which is of course putting Mr vet in trouble and sending her off this job as she failed to give him her packages, and hold on a date? Love truly is blind, I hope yours and mine have eyes, 

“wait what, in trouble?”-Mrs vet says out

“yh wait till you hear it, turns out some kid saw you at one of those your clubs and told his younger brother while being drunk, you did a good job rocking his elder brother that he couldn’t forget you while being drunk huh”- says Mr. Alfred.

Later on, after Mrs vet was queried and given a last chance at work as this wasn’t her first time, 

Wait don’t get it wrong tho, Mrs.vet isn’t a gold digger or some sort of body selling lady, she simply plays smart, she spent years learning how to do this work without actually going too into it, and she ends up being success right before the next step of romance and has never really had the woo-hoo with much people other than her actual x lovers.

Closing the class door as she enters (you little rats, have no idea what responsibility life holds for you, yet you enjoy spoiling someone else own, I teach you well, I treat you well but some dying rats still smell, wait till you top 16, now its time for payback, how about a good story for a nightmare tonight) she said in her mind as she stopped thinking on her sit and stood up to calm the noisy class, then suggested telling them a story today and no class but the condition is they have to stay in class till the end and not a word to the teachers or parents.

“This story is going to make some of you adults and some of you sound cooler when you tell others, it's going to be puberty for some of you as well, your all going to feel like a different person after today when you wake up tomorrow “-she said

“What kind of story danc..” -a random kid

“What kind of story teacher”-another random kid interrupts the first one by pinching him and speaking up instead like she knew what he was going to say, then everyone laughed guessing the same too

(ooh a story your brain will cry throughout the night from, a story your body will ache you from no sleep for some time, a story that will brute force you little brains and hack your puberty to start earlier, annoying rats…)

“teacher….teacher?”-she was interrupted by a random student

“sorry an adventure story filled with intense action and little horror”-she said

“horror? Ok am out”-random kid again

As he stands up

“yh, go run to mama and tell her you scared,” -a badass random boy at the back sit says as everyone laughs, forcing the kid to come back to sit.

(oh bad boy I see…)

“ok guys, the story starts now"-she says

[story in a story]

-“a man wakes up in a forest and was confused, he found himself in a strange house
